home.subtitle: The go-to platform to create, optimize and share your League of Legends builds
home.ctaTitle: Ready to create your first build?
home.ctaText: Join the Lelanation community and share your best setups

seo.homeTitle: Lelanation - League of Legends builds platform
seo.homeDescription: League of Legends builds and guides by the Lelariva community. Create, optimize and share your builds. Statistics, theorycraft, videos.
seo.defaultDescription: League of Legends builds and guides by the Lelariva community. Create, optimize and share your builds.

cookies.title: Cookies & storage preferences
cookies.text: We use local storage for your builds and preferences. We also use Matomo (audience measurement). You can accept or reject non-essential cookies.

statisticsPage.title: LoL Statistics
statisticsPage.description: Winrate and pickrate per champion, computed from Ranked Solo/Duo matches (EUW + EUNE). Filter by rank or role.
statisticsPage.metaTitle: LoL Statistics - Winrate and pickrate by champion | Lelanation
statisticsPage.metaDescription: League of Legends statistics: winrate and pickrate by champion, popular builds and runes. Ranked Solo/Duo EUW and EUNE. Filter by rank and role.
statisticsPage.itemsDescription: Most played items and their winrate.
statisticsPage.spellsDescription: Most used spells and their winrate.
statisticsPage.progressionsDescription: Comparison since version {version}: winrate and popularity (pickrate) evolution across all versions since.
statisticsPage.progressionsNoVersion: No version available. Progressions require per-version data (see Overview).
statisticsPage.overviewDurationWinrateDescription: Smoothed curve: X = duration (min), Y = winrate (%). Origin 0 at bottom-left.
statisticsPage.overviewDetailTimeout: Runes, items and spells could not be loaded (timeout or unavailable).
statisticsPage.overviewTeamsFirstByTeam: % of matches where team got first
statisticsPage.overviewTeamsNoData: No team data (bans/objectives) for this filter.
statisticsPage.sidesDescription: Blue side and red side. Data is filtered by version and division.
statisticsPage.tooltipOverviewTotalMatches: Total number of matches in the database for the selected filter.
statisticsPage.tooltipOverviewLastUpdate: Date of the last match collected.
statisticsPage.tooltipOverviewPlayerCount: Number of distinct players (puuids) who participated in at least one match.
statisticsPage.tooltipFastStatsMostPicked: Pickrate = (games played with this champion) / (total matches) × 100. Top 5 by pickrate, min. 20 games.
statisticsPage.tooltipFastStatsBestWinrate: Winrate = (wins / games) × 100. Top 5 by winrate, min. 20 games.
statisticsPage.tooltipFastStatsMostBanned: Each ban is counted: if both teams ban the same champion = 2 bans. Banrate = (champion ban count) / (2 × total matches) × 100 (100% = banned by both teams in every match).
statisticsPage.tooltipFastStatsWinrateSince: Progression: delta between winrate on the single version (e.g. 16.1) and winrate on all versions since (16.1 + 16.2 + …). +X% = champion performs better over all versions than on the initial version.
statisticsPage.tooltipOverviewObjectives: For each objective: % of matches where the winning team got first, and % where the losing team got it. Sum may be < 100% (e.g. first blood not taken).
statisticsPage.searchPlayerHint: Enter a summoner name and search to view their statistics.
statisticsPage.gameDataItemsHint: Item data not loaded: names/icons will show after game data is loaded.
statisticsPage.gameDataRunesHint: Runes data not loaded: names will show after game data is loaded.
statisticsPage.championStatsSummonerSpellsHint: Per-spell and spell-pair stats for this champion (version and division).
statisticsPage.championStatsDurationWinrateHint: Global curve (all champions) with same rank filter.
statisticsPage.championStatsDurationWinrateChampionHint: Curve for this champion only (same rank filter).
statisticsPage.championStatsPlayersMasterPlus: Top players: Master to Challenger only

stats.title: Statistics
stats.selectChampionPrompt: Select a champion to see statistics
stats.selectChampionAndItems: Select a champion and items to see statistics
stats.disclaimer: Calculations are based on official data and wiki formulas, but may contain errors

skills.firstThreeUpsDescription: Order in which the first 3 skills are learned
skills.skillUpOrderDescription: Order in which skills are maxed first

buildsPage.metaTitle: League of Legends builds - Create and discover builds | Lelanation
buildsPage.metaDescription: Create and discover League of Legends builds by the community. Runes, items, skill order. Lelariva and community builds.
buildsPage.lelarivaComingSoon: This section will be available soon
buildsPage.deleteBuildConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this build? This action cannot be undone.
buildsPage.shareCodeDescription: Enter this code in the Lelanation Companion app to import your builds.
buildsPage.shareCodeExpiry: This code expires in 24h. One-time use.

buildDiscovery.searchPlaceholder: Search builds by champion or author...

createBuild.author: Author
createBuild.descriptionPlaceholder: Explain game plan, strengths/weaknesses, matchups, etc.

legal.title: Legal notice
legal.metaDescription: Lelanation legal notice - Information on the use of Riot Games data and Lelariva content

siteInfo.title: About this site
siteInfo.intro: The Lelanation website is a community platform dedicated to League of Legends builds. This site is run on a personal basis and is not affiliated with, associated with, authorized by, endorsed by, or sponsored by Riot Games, Inc. or its affiliates.

riotData.title: Riot Games data
riotData.p1: This site uses game data (champions, items, runes, summoner spells, etc.) from the Data Dragon API of Riot Games, Inc.
riotData.p2: Lelanation is not an official partner of Riot Games and has no official right, license or authorization from Riot Games to use this data. Use of this data is in accordance with Riot Games' data use policy for non-commercial community projects.
riotData.p3: League of Legends is a registered trademark of Riot Games, Inc. All rights reserved to Riot Games, Inc.
riotData.p4: For more information on Riot Games' data use policy, please visit:

lelariva.title: Lelariva content
lelariva.p1: This site may reference the YouTube content creator Lelariva and may use some of their videos or content as part of the build discovery feature.
lelariva.p2: Lelanation is not an official partner of Lelariva and has no official right, license or authorization from Lelariva to use their content. Use of this content is for fair use and promotion of community content.
lelariva.p3: All rights to Lelariva's content remain with Lelariva. If you are Lelariva and wish to have your content removed from this site, please contact us.

ip.title: Intellectual property
ip.p1: All content created by Lelanation users (builds, descriptions, etc.) remains the property of their respective authors. By publishing content on Lelanation, you grant the site the right to display and share it within the platform.
ip.p2: The design, structure and source code of Lelanation are protected by intellectual property laws.

liability.title: Liability
liability.p1: Lelanation is a community site. Builds and content shared by users are provided for informational purposes only. We do not guarantee the accuracy, relevance or effectiveness of shared builds.
liability.p2: Lelanation cannot be held liable for any direct or indirect damage resulting from the use or inability to use the site or its content.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: For any questions regarding this legal notice or to report content, you can contact us via social networks or the contact form.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.metaDescription: Lelanation privacy policy - Information on cookies, data collected and your rights

dataCollected.title: Data collected
dataCollected.p1: Lelanation uses browser local storage (localStorage) to save your builds and certain preferences (e.g. votes, cookie consent, active tab). No account is required and no personal data is collected.
dataCollected.p2: All data is stored locally on your device and is never transmitted to external servers, except when you choose to share a build publicly.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.p1: Lelanation does not use traditional HTTP cookies. Instead, we use browser localStorage to store:
essential.p2: This data is necessary for the site to function and does not require explicit consent under the GDPR, as it is strictly necessary for the provision of the requested service.

nonEssential.title: Non-essential cookies
nonEssential.p1: Lelanation uses Matomo for audience measurement (page views, navigation). Matomo is an open-source analytics tool that helps us understand how the site is used (no advertising or data resale).
nonEssential.p2: Matomo tracking is only enabled after your explicit consent via the cookie banner. You can refuse; the site then works without audience analytics.

manage.title: Managing your preferences
manage.p1: You can at any time modify or delete data stored in your browser by:
manage.li1: Deleting the site data in your browser settings
manage.li3: Disabling JavaScript (this will prevent the site from functioning)

shareBuilds.title: Sharing builds
shareBuilds.p1: When you choose to make a build public, it is stored on our servers and can be viewed by all site users. Public builds only include the information you have chosen to share (name, description, author, build configuration).
shareBuilds.p2: You can at any time delete a public build from the "My Builds" page or by making it private.

thirdParty.title: Data from third parties
thirdParty.p1: Lelanation retrieves game data (champions, items, runes, etc.) from Riot Games' Data Dragon API. This data is cached locally to improve site performance.
thirdParty.p2: No personal data is shared with Riot Games or other third parties as part of this data retrieval.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.intro: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.access: Right of access: You can view all your data stored locally
rights.rectification: Right to rectification: You can modify your builds and preferences at any time
rights.erasure: Right to erasure: You can delete your builds and data locally
rights.portability: Right to portability: Your data is already in your browser, you can export it
rights.p2: To exercise these rights, you can simply delete the site data in your browser settings or individually delete your builds from the interface.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, you can contact us via social networks or the contact form.

analytics.title: Audience measurement (Matomo)
analytics.p1: Lelanation uses Matomo to analyse site usage (page views, duration, navigation). Matomo is hosted according to our configuration; data is not shared with ad networks.
analytics.p2: Tracking is only enabled after your consent (cookie banner). You can withdraw consent at any time by deleting the site data in your browser settings.

lelanationApp.metaDescription: Download the Lelanation companion app to import your builds into the LoL client and sync matches.
lelanationApp.title: Lelanation App
lelanationApp.subtitle: The Windows companion app connecting your LoL client experience with the Lelanation web project.
lelanationApp.downloadHint: The download link always points to the latest available version.
lelanationApp.smartScreenText: During installation, Windows may show an "Unknown publisher" warning. This is expected: our app is signed but we don't yet have a Microsoft-recognized certificate (EV certificate). The application contains nothing malicious and its source code is fully open-source.
lelanationApp.smartScreenSteps: To proceed with installation, click "More info" then "Run anyway".

features.importBuilds: Import builds into the LoL client (runes, items, summoner spells based on your settings).
features.localFavorites: Favorites are stored locally on your device (no server storage).
features.matchSync: Sends end-of-game info (matchId + region) to enrich website stats.
features.settings: Clear settings to control what gets imported.

lelanationApp.gdprIntro: Privacy is built-in from the MVP:

items.consent: Explicit consent before using sync features.
items.minData: Data minimization: only matchId and region are sent.
items.rights: Access/deletion rights through local data controls and privacy policy.

videosPage.metaTitle: League of Legends videos - Builds and guides | Lelanation
videosPage.metaDescription: League of Legends videos and guides: builds, tier lists, meta. Lelariva and community content. Discover popular builds on video.

theorycraft.title: Theorycraft
theorycraft.metaDescription: Optimize your build: precise stats, spell damage per rank, level 1-18
theorycraft.configurePrompt: Configure your build (champion, runes, items, skill order) to see stats and damage.
theorycraft.itemStacksDescription: Number of stacks for stackable items
theorycraft.passiveStacksDescription: Champion passive stacks (e.g. Veigar Q, Nasus Q)
theorycraft.enemyTargetDescription: Target parameters to calculate real damage
theorycraft.spellDamageUnavailable: Damage per rank values are not provided by Data Dragon (effect is 0). Community Dragon data will be used when available.

appDownload.title: Download companion app
appDownload.description: Windows app to import builds into the LoL client and submit matches to the site.

riotMatch.title: Riot data collection
riotMatch.pollerHint: Active = a collect succeeded in the last 10 minutes (worker or button below).
riotMatch.workerStartHint: To start the worker (collect loop): in the backend folder, run « npm run riot:worker ». This is not the backfill.
riotMatch.backfillTitle: Fill missing participant ranks from Riot API then recompute Match.rank. Runs in background.
riotMatch.backfillBackground: Backfill ranks started in background. Refresh in a few minutes.
riotMatch.stopPollerSuccess: Stop request sent. The worker will exit at the end of the current cycle.
riotMatch.triggerBackground: Collect started in background. Refresh in 2–5 min to see updated status.
riotMatch.description: Manual run of the match collection cron (Ranked Solo/Duo EUW/EUNE). If the worker (npm run riot:worker) is stopped, the button runs a single collect in background.
riotMatch.leagueExpTitle: Calls /lol/league-exp/v4/entries/{queue}/{tier}/{division} and adds players for later polling.
riotMatch.leagueExpBackground: League-exp discovery started in background. Refresh in a few minutes.

scripts.label: Poller scripts
scripts.noLogs: No logs available for this script.

descriptions.worker: Continuous collection loop: fetches new matches, stores participants, and refreshes stats automatically.
descriptions.collectOnce: Runs a single immediate collection pass (no loop) to fetch matches quickly.
descriptions.backfillRanks: Fills missing participant ranks from Riot API, then recomputes Match.rank.
descriptions.backfillRoles: Fills missing participant roles (TOP/JUNGLE/MID/ADC/SUPPORT) from Riot match data.
descriptions.backfillUntilDone: Runs backfill (ranks + roles) in a loop until no null data remains. Single process with PID.
descriptions.refreshMatchRanks: Recomputes Match.rank for existing matches based on participant ranks.
descriptions.discoverPlayers: Discovers additional players from historical matches of known players, then stores them.
descriptions.discoverLeagueExp: Scans Riot league entries by queue/tier/division and adds those players for future polling.
descriptions.enrichPlayers: Enriches existing players by fetching/normalizing missing fields (e.g. summoner_name).

riotApikey.title: Riot API key
riotApikey.description: Key used for Riot API calls (developer.riotgames.com). Stored on the server and overrides the RIOT_API_KEY environment variable when set.

seedPlayers.title: Seed players
seedPlayers.description: Riot IDs used as starting point for match collection. The cron fetches their matches (current patch), then PUUIDs of other players to expand the crawl. Format: Name#Tag or Name-Tag (e.g. Urpog#URGOT). On op.gg the Riot ID is in the URL: /summoners/euw/Urpog-URGOT → enter Urpog-URGOT or Urpog#URGOT.
seedPlayers.labelPlaceholder: Riot ID (Name#Tag or Name-Tag, e.g. Urpog#URGOT)
seedPlayers.empty: No seed players. Add pseudos to start collection from them.
seedPlayers.alreadyInSeedList: This player is already in the seed list.
seedPlayers.playerAlreadyInDatabase: This player is already in the database (their matches are already collected).
seedPlayers.playerAlreadyInDatabaseName: This player ({name}) is already in the database (their matches are already collected).
seedPlayers.allPlayersDescription: Players whose matches are already collected. Adding a player already in the database is blocked.

replays.title: Match replay links
replays.description: Fetch recent matches from Riot for a summoner and generate replay links.

matchups.title: Matchup tier list
matchups.description: Lane-vs-lane score (-10 to +10) driven mostly by winrate, with KDA/level adjustments and patch delta.

adminApp.title: Lelanation App (Admin)
adminApp.description: This Windows companion app connects the LoL client with the Lelanation project. It imports builds (runes, items, summoner spells based on your settings), keeps favorites locally, and sends matchId + region after each game.
adminApp.unavailable: Installer not available. Configure COMPANION_APP_INSTALLER_PATH or COMPANION_APP_DOWNLOAD_URL on backend.

features.importBuilds: Build import into LoL client through LCU.
features.localFavorites: Favorites and preferences are stored locally, not on server.
features.matchSync: Sends matchId + region to backend for stats ingestion.
features.settings: Import settings: runes, items, summoner spells.

adminApp.gdprIntro: The app follows data minimization principles:

gdpr.consent: Explicit consent is required before sync.
gdpr.privacyPolicy: Privacy policy is available on the website.
